remarks: Projective subspace sum is associative.  Equation 16.2.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 68.  In our version, the subspaces do not have to be nonempty. (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-2011.)
statement:
paddass.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddass.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddass $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( ( X .+ Y ) .+ Z ) = ( X .+ ( Y .+ Z ) ) ) $.
